title: got the lancer blitz skin but its not out yet
body: opened a project chest and got it as one of the skins and unlocked it and its not out yet. can u actually get skins that havent been released yet through chests?

replies.body: The skin is out, the problem was a glitch with the STORE, if you bought it before it was taken off the or you get it in a loot chest, then you good to go man, the skin works alright in game
Yep, this is correct! <3 We should have the skins up and running for everyone in 7.24!
technically it was out; they removed it from the store because there was an issue with it and refunds. Since you can't refund tokens, I think they left that part still intact
